@Fridder wrote:

You guys do realize this person just wants views, and the more you post the higher it gets bumped, more views, more people on the server. This person doesn’t care about the punishments or how much you people say this is in the wrong section. Look, it’s a first time poster and the last log in was after this topic was created.
